title: I need a little RP :C
body: Is there a way to get a little bit of RP without spending a whole $5? I need 61 RP. lmao.

replies.body: 61RP might be a bit too much of an ask, but I have seen it granted from time to time for some stellar fan art submissions. As SephirothSG mentioned, definitely reach out to Player Support in a ticket to see what they can do!

Hey there,

I hear that the friendly folks on the Player Support team sometimes hand out RP in exchange for fanart (Even bad fanart), why don't you try [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to them with some art (made by you) attached with your request.
